descriptions.en: This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help. Palafin will never show anybody its moment of transformation.
descriptions.es: This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help. Palafin will never show anybody its moment of transformation.
descriptions.ca: Aquest Pokémon canvia la seva aparença si escolta els seus aliats demanant ajuda. El Palafin mai mostrarà a ningú el seu moment de transformació.
